content:
path /v3/custodial/wallet
operationid custodialgetwallets
summary get managed addresses
description 1 credit per api call
get all managed addresses for an api key
responses
200
schema
type array
custodialmanagedaddress
type object
required
address
walletid
chain
properties
address
type string
description blockchain address
walletid
type string
format uuid
description unique identifier of the managed address
chain
type string
description blockchain of the address
privatekey
type string
description private key of the address not present by default
description ok
tag_summary:
custodial api is a set of operations which allows you to work with managed blockchain addresses without having its private key
you can easily create new managed address and export its details  with private key as well  once required
this features are currently in alpha version
title: 14_Custodial managed wallets_CustodialGetWallets_158.json
